level.description: The Robot Color Database contains some bugged values. Remember, the <color=#ffff00ff>PRINTER</color> tool can give you information. Use the <color=#ff00ffff>WARPER</color> tool to travel to the affected color groups. Check the RGB values and use the BUGCATCHER to catch the bug.
level.introtext: The Color Database needs to be fixed. You'll have to find which values are invalid. The <color=#ff00ffff>WARPER</color> tool will help!
level.endtext: You found the first bugged color value! There are still more bugs to find.
